section.p: The sky is the colour of thunder. From behind the clouds comes the muttering of a great storm. The sailors chatter in fear. ‘It is the voice of Elnir,’ says the cook. ‘And he ain’t inviting us to dance no blessed jig!’

p.if: If you have the blessing of Safety from Storms, you can ignore the storm; cross off the blessing and .

section.p:
Otherwise the storm hits with titanic fury, tossing huge waves across the deck.
